dcterms:description: A question classification dataset translated into Hindi, involving classifying a question sentence into six types with a train-test split of 5452 training samples and 500 testing samples.
dcterms:title: TREC

dcterms:description: A sentiment analysis dataset of one-sentence movie reviews rated from 1 to 5, translated into Hindi with a train-test-dev split of 8544 training, 2210 testing, and 1101 validation samples.
dcterms:title: SST-1

dcterms:description: A binary sentiment analysis dataset derived from SST-1, with positive and negative labels, translated into Hindi with a train-test-dev split of 6920 training, 1821 testing, and 872 validation samples.
dcterms:title: SST-2
